title: Our Houses Are On Fire | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Lori Meyers | 4/14/21
description:
Glenn warns about the real pandemic that’s occurring in our schools and brainwashing our children: critical race theory. Our academic houses are on fire, so is it time to evacuate our kids? Distribution of Johnson & Johnson’s COVID-19 vaccine has been paused, but should it have been? The Supreme Court is ruling in favor of religious freedom, and the Left isn’t happy. Journalist Jason Whitlock returns to describe his time in "Twitter jail," the extreme criticism he receives for being a black conservative, and his message for healing America through faith. Lori Meyers, co-founder of Educators for Quality and Equality, joins to share her insight on critical race theory, how it’s even entering math classes, and how parents can stand up.
